        public abstract Parameter Times(double lambda)
        Multiplies (not in place) the current parameter p by a real number \f$ \lambda \f$.
        Parameters:
        lambda - value \f$ \lambda \f$
        Returns:
        \f$ \lambda p \f$

        Returns:
        \f$ \langle p , q \rangle \f$
